intro: Euphrasia ramulosa, commonly known as the slender eyebright, is a flowering plant native to Europe and parts of Asia. It belongs to the Scrophulariaceae family and is characterized by its delicate, yellow-orange flowers that bloom in early spring. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as woodlands and meadows. It has slender, branched stems and small, lance-shaped leaves. Euphrasia ramulosa is often used in traditional herbal medicine for its purported health benefits.
